alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 9:19PM MST until December 17 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM THURSDAY TO 8 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches with 6 to 12 inches possible in the Ogden Valley. * WHERE...Wasatch Back. * WHEN...From 2 AM Thursday to 8 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
